rules_text:
When Inexorable Legion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.
Inexorable Legion gets +1/+1 for each other Skeleton you control.
Undying [i](When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
